citingPaper.title: Single-Cell Analysis of the Multicellular Ecosystem in Viral Carcinogenesis by HTLV-1
citingPaper.abstract: High-dimensional single-cell landscape of immune alterations during HTLV-1 infection and leukemogenesis identifies hallmarks of premalignant and malignant T-cell states and the accompanying shift of systemic immune state toward myeloid and immunosuppressive.
